text: Nan adarasi, ia fɨrighrasa, God ifonge, egha kamaghɨn a ian dia. Eghtɨ ia ua Moses Osirizir Arazibar apengan ikian kogham, egh ia kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan markɨ, “E Moses Osirizir Araziba e ikiagharɨghɨzir arazir kaba ategha e fɨriaghɨre. Egh e navir ghurimɨn arazibar amuam.” Moses Osirizir Arazibar mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, da bar uari inigha akar vamɨran iti. “Nɨ uabɨ gifongezir moghɨn uan akar gumazibagh ifongegh.” Ia bar Godɨn gumazamizibar ingangarir gumazibar mɨn ikɨvɨ, uarira uarigh ifongegh. Egh ia uarir atar pura tintinibar uariv sogh, egh ia deravɨra nɨghnɨgh. Ia uarigh asɨghasɨgham.
